Name: Claris the Princess Knight ~ Extra Story
About the game: 'Claris the Princess Knight～Extra Story' is a short side story of 'Claris the Princess Knight' developed by Circle Fairy Flower and published by BokiBokiGames! This work can be run independently without installing the main game of 'Claris the Princess Knight'. It is recommended to play 'Claris the Princess Knight' first, and then experience this side story, you will have a better game experience! / Story 'Claris' is the knight princess who likes to kill bandits the most❤ But because of the vengeful spirit of the bandit, she became the knight princess of the miscellaneous fish. In a certain timeline, she encountered a powerful curse! Her level has dropped to the lowest level, what will happen to her....? This side story contains new CG and difference pictures, and there are more serious stories and dirty pictures! Game Features Additional CG images + three erotic events Short RPG content experience Quick access to pornographic events Event recall function
